14100.name: Teddy Girl Agathion Bracelet (event) - 7-day limited period
14100.description: Dimensional item. Can summon a Teddy Girl Agathion when equipped. Can be used for 7 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Release Seal on Agathion - Girl Teddy Girl

14101.name: Sudden Agathion (Event) - 7-day limited period
14101.description: Dimensional item. Can summon a Sudden Agathion when equipped. Can be used for 7 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Release Seal on Agathion - Anger

14102.name: Shiny Agathion (Event) - 7-day limited period
14102.description: Dimensional item. Can summon a Shiny Agathion when equipped. Can be used for 7 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Release Seal on Agathion - Joy

14103.name: Sobbing Agathion (Event) - 7-day limited period
14103.description: Dimensional item. Can summon a Sobbing Agathion when equipped. Can be used for 7 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Release Seal on Agathion - Sorrow

14104.name: Shadow Item - Collection Agathion Summon Bracelet
14104.description: Bracelet that can summon a Collection Agathion. Cannot be exchanged/dropped. Collection Agathion Release Seal

14118.name: Vesper Cutter - Haste
14118.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by 11% and damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

14119.name: Vesper Cutter - Health
14119.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25% and damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

14120.name: Vesper Cutter - Focus
14120.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 131. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

14125.name: Vesper Buster - Acumen

14126.name: Vesper Buster - Magic Hold
14126.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Root is given a 20% chance when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14127.name: Vesper Shaper - Critical Damage
14127.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases P. Atk. by 906 during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Crtical Damage

14128.name: Vesper Shaper - HP Drain
14128.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Restores 4% of melee damage inflicted upon the enemy to your own HP. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: HP Drain

14129.name: Vesper Shaper - Haste
14129.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Atk. Spd. increases by 11%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

14131.name: Vesper Fighter - Health

14144.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30% and damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

14145.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases M. Atk. by 151. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Empower

14149.name: Vesper Thrower - Focus
14149.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 133. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

14150.name: Vesper Thrower - Critical Slow
14150.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 33% chance of slowing the enemy during a critical attack. Also increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14151.name: Vesper Pincer - Haste
14151.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Cutter Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 11%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. When enchanted to 4 or more, there is a chance that party members including yourself will get increased P. Atk., M. Atk. and the amount of recieved heal, and decreased MP consumption per skill during a critical attack. Special Ability: Haste

14152.name: Vesper Pincer - Health
14152.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Cutter Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Max HP increased by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. When enchanted to 4 or more, there's a chance that party members including yourself will get increased P. Atk., M. Atk., and the amount of received heal and decreased MP consumption per skill during a critical attack. Special Ability: Health

14153.name: Vesper Pincer - Focus
14153.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Cutter Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 131. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. When enchanted over 4, there is a chance that party members including yourself can increase attack power, magic power, and healing capacity and decrease MP consumption per skill during a critical attack. Special Ability: Focus

14154.name: Vesper Shooter - Cheap Shot
14154.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Thrower Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. MP consumption decreases 12%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14155.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Thrower Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 133. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

14156.name: Vesper Shooter - Critical Slow
14156.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Thrower Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Casts Slow at a 24% rate during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14157.name: Vesper Nagan - Haste
14157.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Slasher Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 11%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

14166.name: Life Stone - Level 84
14166.description: An ordinary mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 84 and above.

14167.name: Mid-Grade Life Stone - Level 84
14167.description: A mid-grade mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 84 and above.

14168.name: High-Grade Life Stone - Level 84
14168.description: A high-grade mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 84 and above.

14169.name: Top-Grade Life Stone - Level 84
14169.description: The highest-grade mineral available that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 84 and above.
